alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 11:22AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Volusia County through 1145 AM EDT... At 1122 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Barberville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daytona Beach, Pierson, Barberville, DeLeon Springs and Eldridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
